file_content.text: Patrol unit G0-S5 = requires assistance // Critical Imperial personnel = missing in action
Strike unit "Grek team" = conducting priority assault mission // Last field report = thirty-four hours ago // Suspected KIA
Mission failure = unacceptable // Request = locate Grek team + ensure mission completion
G0-S5 = uploading Grek team's last known coordinates // Target area = hostile territory // Recommend extreme caution
Details = unavailable // Grek team leader "Sergeant Peden" = retains mission specs
G0-S5 = will continue hailing Grek team // Success = unlikely
